TopicTitle: How many ones' climbed the flagpole on KSC?

Articles.Content: It seems that Devs put some kind of "invisible ladder" on it.

If I recall, you've been able to climb the flagpoles since the implementation of flags when 0.20 came out.

Needless to say, I've done it dozens of times.
I've done it once or twice, but it's only interesting the first time.

As nAssailant said, it's been possible to climb the flag pole since it's introduction in .20

I've sent a Kerbal up it for giggles, but there really isn't much point as you can't stand on top of the flag pole. I have Jeb standing on that one container near the launch pad though, he surveys every launch and decides if they need more boosters
